paper_abstract: The use of wiki tools in personal and professional contexts has increased in the past years. This article provides an overview on recent developments of wiki technologies, and tries to determine their acceptance level in an academic environment. Also, suggestions are presented that may influence future developments in this area. (C) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 20: 646653, 2012
paper_title: Effect of the usage of wikis on an educational context
